subject: Football
Rhabdomyolysis (Muscle Disease)
lead_paragraph: The University of Iowa said Wednesday that it would put in safeguards to better protect the health of athletes after 13 football players were hospitalized with rhabdomyolysis.
snippet: The University of Iowa said Wednesday that it would put in safeguards to better protect the health of athletes after 13 football players were hospitalized with rhabdomyolysis.
